introduction.paragraph: This request retrieves information about a database.

body.paragraph: This request does not have any required headers.
This request does not use query parameters.
This request does not use a message body.

unordered-list.list-item: 404 Not Found – Requested database not found

body.paragraph: This response uses only standard HTTP headers.
The message body is a JSON document that contains the following objects:

row.entry: Total amount of data stored on the disk. Units: bytes
Date and time the database was opened. Units: microseconds since the epoch (1 January 1970)
Number of updates to the database

body.paragraph: The following example retrieves information about a database named beer-db.
body.code-block:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Server: CouchbaseLite 1.485 Content-Type: application/json Accept-Ranges: bytes Content-Length: 281 Cache-Control: must-revalidate Date: Fri, 06 Dec 2013 22:31:17 GMT
{ "instance_start_time" : 1386620242527997, "committed_update_seq" : 25800, "disk_size" : 15360000, "purge_seq" : 0, "db_uuid" : "65FB16DF-FFD7-4514-9E8D-B734B066D28D", "doc_count" : 5048, "db_name" : "beer-db", "update_seq" : 25800, "disk_format_version" : 11 }
body.paragraph: The following example shows the response returned when you request information about a database that does not exist on the server. The example requests information about a database named cookbook, which does not exist on the server.
body.code-block:
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found Transfer-Encoding: chunked Accept-Ranges: bytes Content-Type: application/json Server: CouchbaseLite 1.485 Date: Sun, 08 Dec 2013 20:16:50 GMT
{ "status" : 404, "error" : "not_found" }
